pdgm.pdgmnote: Lamberti1993b pp.177-179;199-200. The verbs listed in the lexeme section all have slight inflectional idiosyncracies in the affirmative. In the negative the inflect regularly on the basis of a special negative stem .

Lamberti1993b p.200-202. Interrogative forms are made by substituting the interrogative pronominal endings for the non-interrogative in the (otherwise fully formed) non-iterrogative form. Special mention need be made only for the Jussive,aff and neg,and the neg aorHab

Lamberti1993b pp.202-209. Has only present positive and negative. Past tenses come from ja-,future/jussive from woott-. In some cases adjectives can be directly conjugated like verbs. Cf. also paradigm for fa- éxist.
